Package Steganography.Logic

Class ZLibCompression

  • java.lang.Object
    • Steganography.Logic.ZLibCompression

  • public class ZLibCompression
extends java.lang.Object
    The ZLibCompression class handles the compression/decompression of a file or byte array to reduce the effect of the embedded data on the steganographic image using the Java ZLib compression/decompression library.

    Deflator is used to compress data and Inflator to decompress data.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static int BUF_SIZE
      Size of the buffer used to compress a file by chucks.

        Returns:

      • decompress

        public static void decompress​(java.io.File compressed,
                              java.io.File raw)
        Decompresses a given file that was compressed by compress(File, File) using Inflator.
        Parameters:
        compressed - file to be decompressed
        raw - file to which decompressed data will be written

      • decompress

        public static byte[] decompress​(byte[] compressed)
        Decompresses a given byte array that was compressed by compress(byte[]) using Inflator.
        Parameters:
        compressed - byte array to be decrypted
        Returns:
        a byte array with the decompressed data.

        Copies an InputStream to an OutputStream in chucks using a buffer
        Parameters:

        os - OutputStream (destination of data)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs when reading from InputStream or writing to OutputStream.
